messages.title: ELECTION COMMUNICATION
messages.content: To save paper we are sending one letter to each house. Please show to everyone over 18 years. Thank you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support for family-run farms, local shops, and quality at an affordable price.
Transport system for Ceredigion that is fit for the future.
Democratic reform to ensure everyone's voice is counted.

issues.health: The Green Party is here for the services that make a difference to so many lives.
issues.socialWelfare: The Green Party is here for the services that make a difference to so many lives.

housing.content: Support for improved homes and a minimum wage. We want a living wage or pension for all. We plan to create 1 million new jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will fight for these things because a healthy, thriving country should be our heritage and our children's future. I wish for my two sons to have a future worth fighting for. I want your family to have one too.

images.caption: Leila Kiersch with the 'Better Buses' report
